SEARCH
Package models

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
models.Appointment
public class Appointment extends Object
Represents an appointment between a doctor and a patient. This class includes details such as the doctor ID, patient ID, date, time, status, and outcome of the appointment.

  • Constructor Summary
